summary: Sets the levels of the Lions and Lionesses in the Prides of Skyrim Mod to scale with the player. Along with one or two other tweaks.
descriptionHtml:
Yes that\'s right the long awaited patch to the Prides of Skyrim Mod. Mostly because the author refuses to release a patch himself. So I dug through the files to try and find where exactly the lions were and finally found them.

They now scale with the player at a rate of twice the players level. Which means that by the time you are level ten they are twenty, by level fifteen they are level thirty and so on.
Also I decreased the aggro radius because it just seemed too wide to me. 
Finally I adjusted the size of the two to be a bit more varied.

Hope you guys enjoy this.

Obviously you need the actual mod to use this. So go download it it\'s awesome. It can be found [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12647/]here.[/url]
author: GirArg
